explanation.text2: This page is here to explain how to use this application.
explanation.text3: This application allows you to make a reservation for a sail and a board, for a specific time slot.
explanation.text5: Create an account, and when connected to your account, go to the 'Reservation' tab
explanation.text7: Create an account, and when connected to your account, go to RÃ©servation.
explanation.text8: On this page you will be able to chose a timeslot, and then one of the boards and sails currently available
explanation.text9: You can also make a reservation for a harness and a wetsuit on this page, if you need one
explanation.text10: When your reservation is done, you just have to come to GUC Voile to get your equipment!
explanation.text11: For more information on GUC Voile, you can check our website :  https://www.guc-voile.com/
